A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There was no plot. The entire movie was one chase scene. The video game side quest had no depth and took way too long. There were so many inconsistencies that it was distracting. TFA is made worse with the addition of this film because the few interesting questions that movie raised\, this movie threw in the garbage. The few answers they bothered to give were awful. I hope you didn't like a lot of the main characters of TFA\, because they're made to look like idiots in this. It looked nice except when it looked like a TV movie. Lastly\, two things: 1. Why wasn't a single pilot wearing goggles as they were flying through salt clouds? and 2. Lando would've answered that call.
